Hero.title: React Kolkata
Hero.subtitle: Build. Learn. Connect.
Hero.description: A modern hub for React developers in Kolkata. Join our meetups, talks, and workshops to grow your skills and network with the community.

About.title: About React Kolkata
About.description: We are a community-driven group focused on knowledge-sharing, collaboration, and career growth for React developers across Kolkata and beyond. Our mission is to create an inclusive space where developers of all levels can learn, grow, and contribute.
About.what_we_do_description: Discover the various ways we support and grow our developer community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empower developers through events, workshops, and mentorship while fostering an inclusive, welcoming community for continuous learning and growth.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Openness, inclusivity, continuous learning, and giving back by sharing knowledge, opportunities, and supporting each other's professional journey.

impact.title: Community Impact
impact.description: Monthly meetups, lightning talks, hands-on sessions, and collaborations with local tech organizations to strengthen Kolkata's developer ecosystem.

technical_workshops.title: Technical Workshops
technical_workshops.description: Hands-on coding sessions covering the latest React patterns, tools, and best practices.

community_meetups.title: Community Meetups
community_meetups.description: Regular gatherings to network, share experiences, and learn from fellow developers.

lightning_talks.title: Lightning Talks
lightning_talks.description: Quick, focused presentations on specific topics, tips, and emerging technologies.

project_showcases.title: Project Showcases
project_showcases.description: Platform for members to demo their projects and get feedback from the community.

mentorship_program.title: Mentorship Program
mentorship_program.description: Connect experienced developers with newcomers for guidance and career support.

open_source.title: Open Source Contributions
open_source.description: Collaborative projects and contributions to the broader React ecosystem.

Events.title: Events
Events.description: Join our meetups and workshops. Learn, network, and build together.
Events.community_partners_description: We collaborate with amazing communities to bring more value to you.

Blog.title: Latest from the Blog
Blog.description: Guides, tips, and community highlights from React Kolkata.

Contributors.title: Our Contributors
Contributors.description: Meet the amazing people who make React Kolkata possible. These contributors have helped build, maintain, and grow our community through their code, ideas, and dedication.
Contributors.footer_note: Contributors are automatically fetched from our GitHub repository. Thank you to everyone who has contributed to React Kolkata!

Sponsors.title: Our Sponsors
Sponsors.description: React Kolkata is powered by generous sponsors who help us run events, workshops, and community initiatives. Interested in sponsoring us? Get in touch!

card.title: Become a Sponsor
card.description: Support the community by sponsoring an event or contributing resources. Sponsors gain visibility among developers and help keep our activities accessible.

sample.name: Showcase your brand — become a sponsor
sample.description: Showcase your brand at React Kolkata — sponsor an event to gain visibility with local developers, support workshops, and help the community grow.

NotFound.dosen't_exist_text: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

Footer.description: A community for React developers in Kolkata. Meet, learn, and build together.

Volunteers.title: Community Champion
Volunteers.description: Meet the dedicated individuals who volunteer their time and effort to organize events, manage the community, and help React Kolkata thrive.
Volunteers.join_description: We are always looking for passionate people to join our team. Whether you're an expert or a beginner, there are many ways to help!
